description:
What do you need to make a good presentation? One of the best advertising campaigns used simply a sticky note for their presentation (Nike, "Just do it").

Join us and learn how to make high-impact presentations.

Summary:

In this lesson you will learn how to make persuasive and impactful presentations using communication techniques and tricks of the trade.

Objectives:

• To make persuasive presentations.

• To make good looking presentations that are a big hit

Suggestions:

• Divide the presentation into steps: development and delivery.

• Use the techniques and 7 tricks of the trade offered as a way of developing useful communication habits.

When preparing your presentation there are three essential questions to answer:

1) What is your end game?

2) Who is your audience?

3) How should you structure your presentation?

Learn this and more... and use the seven tricks of the trade and present your ideas, products and projects in a powerful and influential way!
title: Learn how to make high-impact presentations
